languages.text: "Я благодарен вам за то, что вы сохранили Грегорасу жизнь. Он бы предпочел казнь, но, как и все арбитры, он с полной ответственностью примет назначенное наказание. Я буду навещать своего бывшего командира — не хочу, чтобы он оставался наедине со своей виной".

traits.locale_text: "Я благодарен вам за то, что {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_MarshalAliveDecision}вы сохранили Грегорасу жизнь{/d}. Он бы предпочел казнь, но, как и все арбитры, он слишком суров к себе. Я буду навещать своего бывшего командира — не хочу, чтобы он оставался наедине со своей виной".

languages.text: "I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution — like all Arbitrators, he feels duty-bound to accept his punishment. I intend to visit my former commander on occasion — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."
languages.original_text: "Я благодарен вам за то, что вы сохранили Грегорасу жизнь. Он бы предпочел казнь, но, как и все арбитры, он с полной ответственностью примет назначенное наказание. Я буду навещать своего бывшего командира — не хочу, чтобы он оставался наедине со своей виной".

traits.locale_text: "I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution, but, like all Arbitrators, he is too harsh on himself. I will visit my former commander — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."

"I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution, but, like all Arbitrators, he is too harsh on himself. I will visit my former commander — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."

"I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution, but, like all Arbitrators, he is too harsh on himself. I will pay a visit to my former commander — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."

"I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution, but, like all Arbitrators, he is too harsh on himself. I will pay a visit to my former commander — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."

"I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution — like all Arbitrators, he feels duty-bound to accept his punishment. I intend to visit my former commander on occasion — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."

"I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution — like all Arbitrators, he feels duty-bound to accept his punishment. I intend to visit my former commander on occasion — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."

languages.text: 「グレゴラスの命を奪わずにいてくれたこと、感謝しています。彼自身は処刑を望んでいたでしょうが、アービトレイターというのは皆、彼は罰を受けることが義務だと感じています。これからも、時折かつての上官を訪ねるつもりです。彼を罪悪感の中に一人きりにしておきたくはありませんから」
languages.original_text: "I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution — like all Arbitrators, he feels duty-bound to accept his punishment. I intend to visit my former commander on occasion — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."

traits.locale_text: 「グレゴラスの命を奪わずにいてくれたこと、感謝しています。彼自身は処刑を望んでいたでしょうが、アービトレイターというのは皆、自分に厳しすぎるのです。これからも、時折かつての上官を訪ねるつもりです。彼を罪悪感の中に一人きりにしておきたくはありませんから」

languages.text: "Ich bin dankbar, dass Ihr Gregoras' Leben verschont habt. Er hätte die Hinrichtung vorgezogen – wie alle Arbitratoren fühlt er sich an seine Pflicht gebunden, seine Strafe anzunehmen. Ich werde meinen früheren Commander hin und wieder besuchen – ich will ihn nicht mit seiner Schuld alleine lassen."
languages.original_text: "I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution — like all Arbitrators, he feels duty-bound to accept his punishment. I intend to visit my former commander on occasion — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin dankbar, dass Ihr Gregoras' Leben verschont habt. Er hätte die Hinrichtung vorgezogen – wie alle Arbitratoren fühlt er sich an seine Pflicht gebunden, seine Strafe anzunehmen. Ich werde meinen früheren Commander hin und wieder besuchen – ich will ihn nicht mit seiner Schuld alleine lassen."

languages.text: « Je vous remercie d'avoir épargné sa vie. Il aurait préféré une exécution... Comme tous les arbitrators, il estime qu'il est de son devoir d'accepter son châtiment. Je prévois d'aller lui rendre visite de temps à autre. Je ne veux pas le laisser seul avec sa culpabilité. »
languages.original_text: "I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution — like all Arbitrators, he feels duty-bound to accept his punishment. I intend to visit my former commander on occasion — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous remercie d'avoir épargné sa vie. Il aurait préféré une exécution... Comme tous les arbitrators, il estime qu'il est de son devoir d'accepter son châtiment. Je prévois d'aller lui rendre visite de temps à autre. Je ne veux pas le laisser seul avec sa culpabilité. »

languages.text: «Le estoy muy agradecido por perdonar la vida a Gregoras. Él preferiría la ejecución, pero como todos los Arbitrator, se siente obligado por el deber a acatar su castigo. Tengo intención de visitar a mi antiguo comandante de vez en cuando; no quiero dejarlo a solas con su sentimiento de culpa».
languages.original_text: "I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution — like all Arbitrators, he feels duty-bound to accept his punishment. I intend to visit my former commander on occasion — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."

traits.locale_text: «Le estoy muy agradecido por perdonar la vida a Gregoras. Él preferiría la ejecución, pero como todos los Arbitrator, se siente obligado por el deber a acatar su castigo. Tengo intención de visitar a mi antiguo comandante de vez en cuando; no quiero dejarlo a solas con su sentimiento de culpa».

languages.text: “我很感谢你饶了格雷戈拉斯一命。尽管他与所有法务官一样，更宁愿被处以死刑，但出于责任，他还是接受了判决。我打算偶尔去探视一下我曾经的指挥官，我不希望他心怀愧疚，在孤独之中度过余生。”
languages.original_text: "I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution — like all Arbitrators, he feels duty-bound to accept his punishment. I intend to visit my former commander on occasion — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."

traits.locale_text: “我很感谢你饶了格雷戈拉斯一命。尽管他与所有法务官一样，更宁愿被处以死刑，但出于责任，他还是接受了判决。我打算偶尔去探视一下我曾经的指挥官，我不希望他心怀愧疚，在孤独之中度过余生。”

languages.text: "Gregoras'ın hayatını bağışladığınız için size minnettarım. Aksine infaz edilmeyi tercih ederdi. Tüm Yargıcılar gibi cezasını kabullenmeyi vazife bilir. Eski komutanımı ara sıra ziyaret etmeyi planlıyorum. Onu suçluluğuyla bir başına bırakmak istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution — like all Arbitrators, he feels duty-bound to accept his punishment. I intend to visit my former commander on occasion — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."

traits.locale_text: "Gregoras'ın hayatını bağışladığınız için size minnettarım. Aksine infaz edilmeyi tercih ederdi. Tüm Yargıcılar gibi cezasını kabullenmeyi vazife bilir. Eski komutanımı ara sıra ziyaret etmeyi planlıyorum. Onu suçluluğuyla bir başına bırakmak istemiyorum."

languages.original_text: "I am thankful to you for sparing Gregoras's life. He would have preferred execution — like all Arbitrators, he feels duty-bound to accept his punishment. I intend to visit my former commander on occasion — I don't want to leave him alone with his guilt."
